Could someone of you tell me some informations about the dating sistem known as "gengou" or "nengou". I know it was adopted in japan since VII century (Taika Reform) and it was interrupted in 1947 with the institution of the constitution. I also know that in 1979 Ohira Masayoshi decided for the not obligatoriness of the use of this dating sistem. Now, all I want to know is how this sistem works.

Sorry for the long preface!

Salut!

Daniele
